fields.name: duration
fields.desc: The duration of the expansion animation.

fields.name: curve
fields.desc: The curve of the expansion animation.

fields.name: reverseCurve
fields.desc: The reverse curve of the expansion animation.

fields.name: maintainState
fields.desc: Whether the state of the body is maintained when the widget expands or collapses.

fields.name: expansibleBuilder
fields.desc: Builds the widget with the results of [headerBuilder] and [bodyBuilder].
